content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz Trabelsi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I appreciate your interest in my apartment. I understand that you are looking for a place to rent in Mannheim. Can I ask what your budget is for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 500 Euros.

I am a student, so I don't need a lot of space. I just need a place to live. I am dependable and responsible, so I will take care of the apartment and its contents. My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price.

I understand that you may have other requirements or concerns, but please let me know what you need from me.

I am open to negotiating a rental price, but please let me know what you have in mind.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for sharing your budget and requirements, Aziz. I understand that you are a responsible and dependable tenant and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.

Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Mannheim, I would suggest a rental price of 750 Euros per month. This is within your budget and I believe it is a fair price for the apartment and its location.

However, I am open to discussing any additional terms or conditions that you may have in mind. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand that the rental price is 750 Euros per month, but I can't afford that. Is there any possibility of lowering the rental price?

I am willing to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial solution that works for both of us.

I am also open to discussing any additional terms or conditions that may be necessary to make the rental agreement work.

I appreciate your understanding and flexibility in this matter. Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to help.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Aziz. I understand that the rental price of 750 Euros may be too high for you.

In that case, I would be willing to consider lowering the rental price to 650 Euros per month. This is still within your budget and I believe it is a fair price for the apartment and its location.

In addition, I would require you to sign a one-year lease agreement with a six-month notice period. This will ensure that the apartment is occupied for a longer period of time and provide me with some stability in my investment.

I hope this proposal works for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. I am open to discussing any additional terms or conditions that may be necessary to make the rental agreement work.
name: Heinrich Heine
